alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 12:24AM EDT until August 07 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE...SOUTHWESTERN WABASH...EDWARDS AND SOUTHWESTERN GIBSON COUNTIES... At 1124 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Albion, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Carmel, Albion, Grayville, Owensville, Bellmont, Bone Gap, Keensburg, Browns and Golden Gate. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central and southeastern Illinois. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
